item.title: MCU Timeline Part I
item.description: I talked about the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) and why it’s interesting in a previous post. Have a read if you want to get started on this. Today I want to talk about a way of visualising the relationships between the characters and the movies in a timeline (shown above). Visualising the MCU How do we visualise something as complex as the MCU? Well, there are a few other folks who’ve had a go:
